title: A Small Pinch of Weather and Other Stories
description: This is the most unexpected, out of the ordinary book of short stories you can imagine. The sad stories are spiced with wit and the funny ones tinged with sadness, but the one certain thing is that you never feel too sure what will happen next. A magical and fantastic collection of stories by one of the most original children's authors of the 20th century. For 8-11 year olds.
author: Joan Aiken
